DOC.brief_summary: The aim study assess efficacy screen concurrent liquid-based cytology HPV DNA test primary cervical cancer screen 7 year .
DOC.brief_title: CervIcal Cancer Screening Trial Randomization HPV Testing Intervention Upcoming Screening （CITRUS Study）
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women age 3064 year old 2 . Participants provide write informed consent Women 1. receive plan HPV DNA test local governmental cervical cancer program next six year 2. cervical invasive cancer 3. undergone cervical conization 4. undergone hysterectomy 5. cytological abnormality followup 6. pregnant 7. judge ineligible trial physician
